title: How to Make Cookie Fries

steps.headline: Use the sugar cookie mix and create dough using the bag directions.
Roll the dough to an even thickness.
Use a sharp knife and cut the dough into thin strips (about 2 cm.
steps.description: long). Cut a horizontal line through the center of the dough.

steps.headline: Remove every other dough strip.
steps.description: Save the pieces you removed to bake as well. Removing pieces allows the strips to bake and rise without bumping into another piece.

steps.headline: Sprinkle sugar on top of the dough strips.
Bake the dough strips for about 8 minutes or until tan brown in color.
Sprinkle some more sugar on top while they are still warm.
steps.description: This extra sugar coat would give the "fries" the salt effect or look.

text: Use the sugar cookie mix and create dough using the bag directions.  Roll the dough to an even thickness.  Use a sharp knife and cut the dough into thin strips (about 2 cm. long). Cut a horizontal line through the center of the dough. Remove every other dough strip. Save the pieces you removed to bake as well. Removing pieces allows the strips to bake and rise without bumping into another piece. Sprinkle sugar on top of the dough strips.  Bake the dough strips for about 8 minutes or until tan brown in color.  Sprinkle some more sugar on top while they are still warm. This extra sugar coat would give the "fries" the salt effect or look. Finished.
